alert.note: Alert for Finney; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Kearny and southwestern Finney Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Deerfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Holcomb around 525 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Garden City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Kansas.
